Package jakarta.nosql.mapping.column

Interface ColumnQueryMapper.ColumnMapperWhere

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ColumnQueryMapper.ColumnMapperQueryBuild
    Enclosing interface:
    ColumnQueryMapper
    public static interface ColumnQueryMapper.ColumnMapperWhere
extends ColumnQueryMapper.ColumnMapperQueryBuild
    The Column Where whose define the condition in the query.

        ColumnQueryMapper.ColumnMapperNameCondition and​(String name)
        Starts a new condition in the select using ColumnCondition.and(jakarta.nosql.column.ColumnCondition)
        Parameters:
        name - a condition to be added
        Returns:
        the same ColumnQueryMapper.ColumnMapperNameCondition with the condition appended
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when condition is null
